description: I still remember when I had the first job-interview myself. I was very nervous and tried to appear as friendly and motivated as I could. I think the times have changed a little bit. At least the guy who we invited for an interview today appeared rather arrogant. He worked as a security guard before. But the payment was quite bad. And what I didn't like at all - he spoke quite bad about his past employer. However, he looked good. Very sexy in my eyes. So I was very motivated to get my dick into his ass. But I had to start step by step. As I expected he didn't have the money for our registration-fee. So I offered him to strip naked instead. It was quite a long discussion to convince him to do so. But then I wanted more. And I was a bit afraid of his reaction…
title: Dirty Scout 07
